Row.Text: Goryeo (Korean: 고려; Hanja: 高麗; MR: Koryŏ, [ko.ɾjʌ]; Middle Korean: 고ᇢ롕〮, romanized: kwòwlyéy) was a Korean state founded in 918, during a time of national division called the Later Three Kingdoms period, that unified and ruled the Korean Peninsula until the establishment of Joseon in 1392.
In the end, only three things matter: how much you loved, how gently you lived, and how gracefully you let go of things not meant for you.
Use your diplomatic abilites to make friends both at Home and in Distant Lands, and let your enemies beware the Byeolmuban.
